description: Germany's hard lockdown to tackle spiralling coronavirus infection numbers covers Christmas week.
title: Coronavirus: Young Germans adjust festive plans amid lockdown
title_page: Coronavirus: Young Germans adjust festive plans amid lockdown - BBC News
maintext: "My uncle has agreed to be Santa Claus but now with the restrictions he may not come in and talk to the kids - he'll just knock outside the window and say 'Hey, because of Covid I can't come in but here are your gifts!'".
